availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Martin (Providence County, Rhode Island, justice of the peace, notary public, and commissioner of deeds)

body.p: Providence County, Rhode Island, conveyancer, justice of the peace, notary public, and commissioner of deeds. Rhode Island native. Married to Marcy Sheldon Martin in Providence County, Rhode Island, on October 6, 1811. Father of Julia H. Martin and Sarah S. Martin Fogg. Conveyancer in Providence County, Rhode Island, in 1850. Notary public in Providence County in 1853. Justice of the peace in in Providence County in 1853. Commissioner of deeds in Providence County in 1853. Notary public in Providence County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Providence County in 1860. Commissioner of deeds in Providence County in 1860. Notary public in Providence County in 1861. Commissioner of deeds for Kentucky in Rhode Island in 1862. Notary public in Providence County in 1863. Justice of the peace in Providence County in 1863. Notary public in Providence County in 1865. Justice of the peace in Providence County in 1865.
